lightning.name: Lightning (Experimental)
lightning.description: A basic Lightning strike, randomly flashes on for a short time
lightning.intensityDescription: Controls how bright the flash will be
lightning.speedDescription: Controls how often the lightning will strike

flash.name: Simple Flash
flash.intensityDescription: Controls how dim the light will be when it flashes off
flash.speedDescription: Controls how often the light will flash

rgbflash.name: RGB Flash
rgbflash.description: A simple flashing light, cycling between Red, Green and Blue
rgbflash.intensityDescription: Controls how dim the light will be when it flashes off
rgbflash.speedDescription: Controls how often the light will flash

policeflash.name: Police Flash
policeflash.description: A simple flashing light, cycling between Red and Blue, mimicking police lights
policeflash.intensityDescription: Controls how dim the light will be when it flashes off
policeflash.speedDescription: Controls how often the light will flash

torch.name: Deep Torch
torch.description: A deeper, alternative version of the torch

misc.otherString: Miscellaneous strings can go in the 'misc' object of your Author set

closeLightOnSubmit.name: Close Ambient Light sheet on update
closeLightOnSubmit.hint: Disable this to override the default light config behaviour, allowing you to update a light without closing the sheet

closeTokenOnSubmit.name: Close Token sheet on update
closeTokenOnSubmit.hint: Disable this to override the default token config behaviour, allowing you to update its light without closing the sheet. Note that this will cause all token updates to keep the sheet open, not just lighting updates.

notif.libWrapperMissing: Community Lighting recommends to install and activate the 'libWrapper' module.
